description:
Software purpose-built for planning and building teams. All the tools you need to assess, compare, annotate and approve digital plans.


New
- Added the ability to keep all text fields together across multiple PDF stamp text fields
- Added the ability to send logs and crash reports to Trapeze Support when requested, rather than using email
- Added the ability to remove old crash reports when requested
Changes
- Changed overlays to support the option to place the rotation point at the cursor location
- Changed to exit faster while updates are being downloaded
- Changed to add the ability to show a retry dialog during saving when the file being saved is in use
- Changed to remove the crash handler on exit in 64-bit versions (fixes TRIM causing a crash on exit)
Fixes
- Fixed a cloud update file downloading after copying stopped when cancelled
- Fixed a crash after an unrecoverable failed save
- Fixed a crash using comments after the light table
- Fixed a crash using the stamp page command from the image context menu while saving
- Fixed a crash using Bring To Front or Send To Back from the image context menu while saving
- Fixed a crash when a colour settings change is handled during exit
- Fixed a drawing issue with themed property panel labels
- Fixed a potential memory issue when a property panel changes DPI
- Fixed a resource leak when starting Read Mode or Forms Mode fails
- Fixed attempting to show a background update message when the application window has closed
- Fixed document windows overdrawing the background when entering Read Mode or Forms Mode
- Fixed new recession plane annotation not always redrawing correctly when properties are adjusted
- Fixed overlay properties allowing white transparent to be changed when not allowed
- Fixed potential memory leaks in Trapeze Cloud web services calls
- Fixed setting UI back to the default causing UI file cleanup to stop working and log errors
- Fixed the default recession plane and horizontal cone of vision annotations always showing a dialog when placed
